Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillcrest Drive and Melbourne Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Melbourne Avenue, running north and south, runs through most of the town's major shopping centers and also passes by the Melbourne Entertainment Arena, located on the southwest corner of the intersection. Hillcrest Drive runs east and west, spanning most of the southern section of Oceancrest and passing through the large farm areas to the west.
